text: Maggie Riley was an English actress, best known for her roles as Maureen in Hazell and Mrs. McMahonList of Grange Hill characters in children's television series Grange Hill. A member of Olivier's National Theatre company, she made frequent appearances on British TV from the 1960s. She died on 10 October 2015 at the age of 79 after a long illness. ==Credits== ===Television=== {| class= "wikitable" ! Year !! Title !! Role !!
